ostream_iterator.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_OSTREAM_ITERATOR_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_OSTREAM_ITERATOR_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // ostream_iterator.hpp
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 // note: this is a custom version of the standard ostream_iterator.
00020 // This is necessary as the standard version doesn't work as expected
00021 // for wchar_t based streams on systems for which wchar_t not a true
00022 // type but rather a synonym for some integer type.
00023 
00024 #include <ostream>
00025 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_facade.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace boost { 
00028 namespace archive {
00029 namespace iterators {
00030 
00031 // given a type, make an input iterator based on a pointer to that type
00032 template<class Elem>
00033 class ostream_iterator :  
00034     public boost::iterator_facade<
00035         ostream_iterator<Elem>,
00036         Elem,
00037         std::output_iterator_tag,
00038         ostream_iterator<Elem> &
00039     >
00040 {
00041     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00042     typedef ostream_iterator this_t ;
00043     typedef Elem char_type;
00044     typedef std::basic_ostream<char_type> ostream_type;
00045 
00046     //emulate the behavior of std::ostream 
00047     ostream_iterator & dereference() const {
00048         return const_cast<ostream_iterator &>(*this);
00049     }
00050     bool equal(const this_t & rhs) const {
00051         return m_ostream == rhs.m_ostream;
00052     }
00053     void increment(){}
00054 protected:
00055     ostream_type *m_ostream;
00056     void put_val(char_type e){
00057         if(NULL != m_ostream){
00058             m_ostream->put(e);
00059             if(! m_ostream->good())
00060                 m_ostream = NULL;
00061         }
00062     }
00063 public:
00064     this_t & operator=(char_type c){
00065         put_val(c);
00066         return *this;
00067     }
00068     ostream_iterator(ostream_type & os) :
00069         m_ostream (& os)
00070     {}
00071     ostream_iterator() :
00072         m_ostream (NULL)
00073     {}
00074     ostream_iterator(const ostream_iterator & rhs) :
00075         m_ostream (rhs.m_ostream)
00076     {}
00077 };
00078 
00079 } // namespace iterators
00080 } // namespace archive
00081 } // namespace boost
00082 
00083 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_OSTREAM_ITERATOR_HPP
